title: "Exercise Utmost Caution": India's Advisory For Its Nationals In Israel
summary_full: With tensions running high and fears of a broader conflict mounting, the Indian Embassy said it remains in close touch with local authorities and will continue to issue updates for Indian nationals as necessary.
summary_public: With tensions running high and fears of a broader conflict mounting, the Indian Embassy said it remains in close touch with local authorities and will continue to issue updates for Indian nationals as necessary.

IL.label: neutral
IL.evidence: India's Advisory For Its Nationals In Israel
